summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1200, for the improvement of Pike Place, from Pike Street to Stewart Street; Pike Street, from Western Avenue to First Avenue; and Western Avenue, from Virginia Street to Stewart Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and regrading the same, and by constructing all necessary bulkheads retaining walls and stairways, and by planking the same, under Ordinance No. 13267, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
